Mod.Name: Horizon Pack (World Textures)
Mod.Author: MCINDUS + Nameless27 + Slimebucket
Mod.Description:
Horizon Pack Plus - World Texture replacement mod. - Version 2.3 now out! Fatal crash fixed!
- New map Options Added!
- Field Model textures added! -these where broken! fixed in 2.2!
- Towns and world textures re-created using ESRGAN + Gigapixel AI
Original mod Horizonpack v1.0 created by MCINDUS + FatedCourage ffnx conversion to ffnx Nameless27 extra work and junction8 conversion by Slimebucket

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: version 2.3 - fatal crash fixed! version 2.2 - fixes field model option! version 2.0 - adds map and field model options
